import React from "react"; import { FaTimes } from "react-icons/fa"; // 用作右上角叉叉装饰 const About: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* 分隔线 */}
{/* 标题 */}

About

{/* 内容区域 */}
{/* 左边介绍 */}

I’m Celeste, a product designer and manager, with experience working with new technologies.

I deeply focus on UI/UX and product design, creating excellent design through our whole lives.

{/* 右边 CV 框 */}
{/* 右上角关闭图标 */}

I am a seasoned graphic designer, UX/UI designer, and illustrator with over eight years of experience...


After graduating, I founded a design and illustration studio in Shanghai... showcasing my passion for personal IP and product development.


Today, I focus on UX/UI design... delivering exceptional and meaningful creative solutions.

{/* CV 按钮 */}
SEE FULL CV
); }; export default About;
